body_html: Also, I don't think we want to implement their counterparts in all cases zero(x) is really zeros_like(x), which is the one people should usually use. We can have a desugaring pass instead if you'd prefer that (I can change this diff to that).
body_text: Also, I don't think we want to implement their counterparts in all cases zero(x) is really zeros_like(x), which is the one people should usually use. We can have a desugaring pass instead if you'd prefer that (I can change this diff to that).
body: Also, I don't think we want to implement their counterparts in all cases `zero(x)` is really `zeros_like(x)`, which is the one people should usually use. We can have a desugaring pass instead if you'd prefer that (I can change this diff to that).
